title: Unmasking the Billionaire
description: Eve was born on Halloween. She’s the loner with only one friend to her name. When that friend drags her to a masquerade ball for Halloween and dares her to kiss a mysteriously handsome and dangerous-looking stranger for a thousand bucks, there’s no way she’s going to turn down that kind of cash.Besides, Eve might be inexperienced, but they’re all wearing masks, and it’s not like she’ll ever see him again.Right?
author: Emma Bray
